title: SOLD! A TOLSTOI Head over Heels and Hands over head

posts.post_title: SOLD! A TOLSTOI Head over Heels and Hands over head
posts.post_content:
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/31474/ames-hands-over-tolstoi[/IMG]

A very fine T206 card featuring Red Ames, the Hands over Head pose, well centered and graded SGC 50.

Put a Russian Mouthpiece in your collection today for $153 net shipped.
